channel.title: 474 Npc problem
channel.description:
[yes, this is real 474]
First one to help me fix that problem i got, can have this (if u want)... [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2lcbt51.png[/img] - I mean like the mandrith model loads fine, if i use it as drop model for item for example, but not when i load it for npc.
EDIT: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zizxb8.png[/img] -But objects and items load fine with higher model ids, so wheres the problem?

item.title: 474 Npc problem
item.dc:creator: @mige5 mige5
item.description:
@mige5 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:340560”]theres alot of issues with your client.

it says talko, not talk to

anyway, are you saying the npc wont load with its original model but when you make it load a different model it works?[/quote]

read what i said before posting… I have clearly explained why it says “talko” and not “talk-to” and u said my client has a lot of issues because of that?

And i think the problem with models appears when the model id is higher than in the cache… but if i use higher id for item or object it will load.

Read full topic

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

it says talko, not talk to
